case_title: United States of America v. Jackson et al
case_info_full_case_name: United States of America v. Jackson et al

charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1)and(b)(1)(B) Possession With Intent to Distribute A Controlled Substance (1ss)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant Committed to The Bureau of Prisons For A Period of 80 Months to be Served Concurrently With Counts 5ss And 7ss. Upon Release From Incarceration Defendant Placed on Supervised Release For A Period of 4 Years With Special Conditions to be Served Concurrently With All Other Counts. Fine Waived, Special Assessment of $400 Imposed And Forfeiture Ordered. Amended Judgment: Upon Motion Pursuant to 18 Usc Sec. 3582(C)(2), Defendant's Sentence is Reduced to 64 Months to be Served Concurrently With Counts 5ss And 7ss. All Other Provisions of The Earlier Judgment Shall Remain in Effect.

charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1) and (b)(1)(B) Possession W/Intent to Distribut Controlled Substance (5ss)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant Committed to The Bureau of Prisons For A Period of 80 Months to be Served Concurrently With Counts 1ss And 7ss. Upon Release From Incarceration Defendant Placed on Supervised Release For A Period of 4 Years With Special Conditions to be Served Concurrently With All Other Counts. Fine Waived, Special Assessment of $400 Imposed And Forfeiture Ordered. Amended Judgment: Upon Motion Pursuant to 18 Usc Sec. 3582(C)(2), Defendant's Sentence is Reduced to 64 Months to be Served Concurrently With Counts 1ss And 7ss. All Other Provisions of The Earlier Judgment Shall Remain in Effect.

charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1) and (b)(1)(B) Possession W/Intent to Distribut Controlled Substance (6ss)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant Committed to The Bureau of Prisons For A Period of 20 Months to be Served Consecutively to All Other Counts. Upon Release From Incarceration Defendant Placed on Supervised Release For A Period of 3 Years With Special Conditions to be Served Concurrently With All Other Counts. Fine Waived, Special Assessment of $400 Imposed And Forfeiture Ordered.

charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1) and (b)(1)(B) Possession W/Intent to Distribut Controlled Substance (7ss)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant Committed to The Bureau of Prisons For A Period of 80 Months to be Served Concurrently With Counts 1ss And 5ss. Upon Release From Incarceration Defendant Placed on Supervised Release For A Period of 4 Years With Special Conditions to be Served Concurrently With All Other Counts. Fine Waived, Special Assessment of $400 Imposed And Forfeiture Ordered. Amended Judgment: Upon Motion Pursuant to 18 Usc Sec. 3582(C)(2), Defendant's Sentence is Reduced to 64 Months to be Served Concurrently With Counts 1ss And 5ss. All Other Provisions of The Earlier Judgment Shall Remain in Effect.

charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1) and (b)(1)(B) Possession W/Intent to Distribut Controlled Substance (4ss)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant Committed to The Bureau of Prisons For A Period of 60 Months on Count 4ss of Second Superseding Indictment With Credit For Time Served. Upon Release From Incarceration Defendant Placed on Supervised Release For A Period of 4 Years With Special Conditions. Fine Waived, Special Assessment of $100 Imposed And Forfeiture Ordered. Defendant Ineligible For All Federal Benefits For 5 Years.
